title: Episode 22.5: Rather be shot than screenshot
itunes:author: Desus Nice & THE KID MERO
itunes:summary:
Desus Nice (@desusnice) and THE KID MERO (@thekidmero) are the Bodega Boys giving you their irreverent yet hilarious takes on all things pop culture. Recorded at Red Bull Studios in NYC.

This week: Azealia Banks, Drake's beard, screenshotting, The Real world, Mero's Birthday, Chik-fil-a and more!
